page.title: 13SUPERNATURAL.
page.content: Some people believe in ghosts and some don't. I too don't believe in ghosts. Some people say that they have seen ghosts and that they are a misty white and they glow.You can always tell if there is a ghost around; the place goes cold and the temperature goes very low. In Calcoed there used to be a race course near where they are making the new road.There was a well.Where this woman and her horse wanted to jump it.Well one day the woman jumped the well but they both fell down. From that day to this,people say that they have seen the woman and the horse,but nobody has ever found the bodies.
